intro: Shibataea chiangshanensis, commonly known as the Chiangshan holly or Chinese holly, is a species of flowering plant in the family Ericaceae. It is native to China and is characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage and small, clustered white flowers. The plant typically grows in mountainous regions and thrives in acidic, well-drained soils. Its leaves are leathery and glossy, providing ornamental value in gardens. It is also valued for its ecological role in supporting local biodiversity.
